definition: a filamentous projection or process on an organism
details:
noun
- a filamentous projection or process on an organism
- cloth woven from horsehair or camelhair
= synonyms: haircloth
- any of the cylindrical filaments characteristically growing from the epidermis of a mammal
= example: any of the cylindrical filaments characteristically growing from the epidermis of a mammal
= synonyms: pilus
- a covering for the body (or parts of it) consisting of a dense growth of threadlike structures (as on the human head)
- filamentous hairlike growth on a plant
= synonyms: tomentum, fuzz
- a very small distance or space
= example: a very small distance or space
= synonyms: whisker, hair's-breadth, hairsbreadth
